title: Dc'd Mid game  about ~10 minutes, match no longer exists for myself?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
I don't really know what happened. I dc'd from the game, I reconnected to another wifi and tried logging back in, and the match no longer is there and doesn't give me an option to reconnect.

Anyone experiencing a similar problem? I have no idea why this is happening and I **really ** don't want this match to count against me.

I attached a screenshot of the game going on, and I'm currently queuing up for another game.

replies.body: Ahhhh it looks like you got that match information from a separate site than our own match history site, which might be confusing you a bit. As it turns out, that information is incorrect, as the game you were in crashed entirely on the server. The reason you couldn't reconnect is that the game wasn't there to connect to. You haven't been hit with any penalties due to this match, and you should be able to re-queue as usual!
The same thing actually just happened to me, my game is still going and i can't do anything, still waiting to see if it count as a lose or not.
